TopicTitle: Mod to change a part version?

Articles.Content: Hi, i'm looking for a mod thats allows you to select different mod parts versions. I didnt found it on the internet. I need it to change some parts in RN_Soyuz mod (especially, to switch between different versions of R-7 details). Itll be very good if you can tell me at lesat name of the mod. Thank you

Welcome to the forums! unfortunately I'm not sure I fully understand what you're after o__O

Either the RN_Soyuz mod you mention comes with this functionality built in, by relying on one of the known part switching mods (like B9PartSwitch). But in that case, the switching mod is a dependency, and the RN_Soyuz mod will come bundled with it (or, at minimum, tell you exactly which switching mod you need in its installation instructions).

Or, the RN_Soyuz mod does not have this functionality built in, in which case no mod you install will change anything about that fact. You can potentially get differently looking Soyuz parts from other part mods, but you will not get all those variants combined into one part.
